title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content: able Storyline achievement. The Lich-Queen's Wrath Ally with Voss against the Githyanki God-Queen. Good luck. After completing The Githyanki Warrior and upon progressing towards the Shadow Cursed Lands, Kith'rak Voss will meet you at your camp. Agree and convince Lae'zel to work with him. Non-Invasive Procedure Kill the Surgeon before he performs surgery on you in combat. Missable Penny Pincher Defeat the Toll Collector without her using gold against you - excellent budgeting. Missable Under Loc
